activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Filifili se fuaitau fasefulu e teu ai.
Se fasifuaitau faigofie e aofia ai ni nai upu o le ae faigofie ona manatuaina.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Filifili se fuaitau pasi lelei e puipui ai lau teugatupe. Vaʻai fautuaga mo nisi manatu.
activate.IfYouFeel: Afai e te lagona se mea ua sese, e mafai

authorize.TermsLabel:
Ua ou faitau ma ioe
i le {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Muamua e tatau ona e malilie i tuutuuga.

notifications.title: Faatagaga
notifications.prompt: E te manaʻo e faʻatagaina faʻamatalaga? O le ae maua ni faʻamatalaga lata mai i mea e te popole i ai.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Afio mai! Faamolemole siaki lou tuatusi imeli.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Afio mai! Faʻamaonia lau tuatusi imeli.
notifications.ForgetPass: Hey, na e galo lau pasese?
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Ua maeʻa faʻauʻuina tagata. Taumafai e teu i totonu nei.

login.title: Afio mai
login.directions: Fausia se tala, pe ulufale i totonu.
login.directionsNoRegister: Faamolemole pe a iai sau tala.
login.resendConfirm: E te manaʻo e lafo se savali e toefaʻalo ai lau faʻailoga?
login.resendSuccess: Siaki mo se savali e toefaʻailoga lau pasese
login.noPassphrase: Aʻo leʻi mafai ona e ulufale i totonu, e tatau ona e faatulagaina se fuaitau fesuiaiga e ala i le kiliki o le fesoʻotaʻiga i lau savali e faʻasaga ai.
login.notVerified: E tatau ona e auina atu se savali o le toe faatoaga ina ia e ulufale ai.
login.emailExists: Na e taumafai e lesitala i lenei imeli muamua? Afai o lea, siaki lau atigipusa e faʻaagaoioi lau tala. Kiliki ina ia toe auina atu le savali
login.mobileExists: Na e taumafai e lesitala i lenei telefoni feaveaʻi muamua? Afai o lea, siaki lau SSS e faʻaagaoioi ai lau faʻamatalaga. Kiliki ina ia toe auina atu le savali

placeholders.identifier: lau mobile # po o le imeli

login.facebookNoEmail: O lau facebook tala o loʻo misi se tuatusi imeli imeli. Faʻasinoa le ala i le auala masani.
login.picTooltip: E mafai ona e suia lenei ata mulimuli ane

web3.payload: Alu i totonu {{host}} i le taimi {{timestamp}}

alert.title: Faʻatonutonuina i Wallet
alert.content: O le taimi lava e te tapunia ai lenei talanoaga, o le a aveina oe i lau atotupe. A uma ona e saini i totonu, toe foi i lenei itulau.

setIdentifier.title: Faʻaopoopo se auala e teu ai

placeholders.identifier: ulufale i lau mobile # po o le imeli

prompt.title: {{Platform}} Account
prompt.noLongerUsing: E le toe fesoʻotaʻi atu i {{platform}}
